subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Radio
Television
lead_paragraph: The Ford C. Frick Award will be presented to a broadcaster whose work spanned the 1920s to the mid-1950s, but the dearth of audio from that era has made the voting process difficult.
snippet: The Ford C. Frick Award will be presented to a broadcaster whose work spanned the 1920s to the mid-1950s, but the dearth of audio from that era has made the voting process difficult.
